name: Electric Kool Aid
description: Electric Kool Aid is a 60/40 sativa-dominant hybrid strain bred by crossing Purple Diesel and Cherry Pie. Preferred for daytime use, Electric Kool Aid provides uplifting effects that inspire the mind while easing the body into a relaxed state. Hashy notes of sweet lavender and grape flavor the sparkling crystal-covered buds, which can take on a stunning periwinkle blue coloration.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Talkative, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Dry Mouth, Headache, Dry Eyes
